content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES
There are no existing structures on the map as no entities have been created yet.

## ERROR TIPS
- Ensure you have the necessary resources in your inventory before attempting to craft entities. In this case, there were not enough resources to craft a Stone Furnace.
- Always check your inventory for required items before executing crafting actions to avoid running into resource shortages.
- If an assertion error occurs indicating a lack of items, verify your inventory and ensure you have the necessary components before proceeding with actions that depend on those items.
- When attempting to craft items that require sub-ingredients (e.g., Iron Gear Wheel requires Iron Plate), ensure you have the means to produce those sub-ingredients, such as a furnace or crafting machine.
